name: time travel cube
description:
what is the game about?

You are a cube and you have been kidnaped by a shady company that wants you to do some tests that you will have to break time to solve and with every test solve you get closer to escape.

tell me some facts

  • the thin bar in the hud represents how much time data is being stored divided by how much time data your computer can handle.
  • technically there are more than seven levels as every interior room is itself a level.
  • this was made as a college project so if you manage to crash the game you may see references to college stuff on the crash screen.
  • there are two NPCs due to a technicality.
  • saved data can be found in %appdata%/ttc(launcher) and you can easily change the saved data with notepad if you wish to do so.
  • there are some hidden areas on some of the levels.
  • the game can sometimes fail to communicate with the sound driver and as a result, if there is no audio output and communication with the sound driver has failed and the game is fully loaded in all other regards the game will instantly crash as it will assume there is an audio output (so you don't get stuck on the loading screen) but without there actually being one it causes null pointing which is not good.
  • if you have 7zip you can access the games code and mod it.
